column5: Looking for a dock directly on the Intercoastal? Want to sit back, feel the cool ocean breezes, and watch the pelicans dive among the dolphins? This beautiful property wraps you in luxury as you relax in this tropical paradise! Tile throughout, stainless appliances, kitchen island, and stunning views complete the package. LIMIT OF 6 ADULTS at this property! Weekly only (no monthly) bookings over July.
